sentences.en: Bornakk: So you'll still have the randomness and spontaneity of it.
sentences.cn: 所以这种奖励仍然会有随机性和自发性.

sentences.en: Eventually I learned that spontaneity often flows from discipline.
sentences.cn: 最后我终于明白,自发的动作往往出自不断的操练.

sentences.en: Folk, the spontaneity, the mass character highlight many are the stodger.
sentences.cn: 民间性 、 自发性 、 群众性凸显出其中多为平凡人.

sentences.en: He had the spontaneity of a child.
His enthusiasm was somewhat lacking in spontaneity, I thought.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他的热情有点勉强,缺乏自发的冲动.

sentences.en: It is the distribution of energy that determines the direction of spontaneity.
sentences.cn: 决定自发方向的是能量的分布.

sentences.en: Objectives To explore a simple and effective means to treat spontaneity pneumothorax.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨自发性气胸简单有效的治疗方法.

sentences.en: On the crucial night, any spontaneity on his part could cause trouble.
sentences.cn: 行动的那天晚上, 艾希曼任何下意识反击都会引起麻烦.

sentences.en: Regretting the lack of spontaneity and real sensuousness in other contemporary poets, he deplores in Tennyson.
sentences.cn: 他对于和他同时代的诗人缺乏自发性和真实的敏感,感到惋惜, 他对坦尼森感到悲痛.

sentences.en: Spontaneity is more than ever the hallmark of good speaking.
sentences.cn: 随机应变越来越成为一张好嘴的标志.

sentences.en: The 46 - year - old film star is known for his spontaneity.
sentences.cn: 这位46 岁 的影星以表演自然而着称.

sentences.en: The ersatz spontaneity of "Sunday Love" sounds especially hollow.
sentences.cn: 对《星期天的爱情》这首歌的即兴模仿听起来尤其空洞。

sentences.en: The romantic spontaneity and courage are gone.
sentences.cn: 自发的幻想和勇气均荡然无存.

sentences.en: The very spontaneity of his gestures precluded him from managing his own achievements.
sentences.cn: 他那容易冲动的天性使他不能驾驭自己的成就.

sentences.en: You have a high energy a thirst for adventure and spontaneity.
sentences.cn: 你们都精力充沛,向往冒险和自然.

words.tran_cn: 自发的；自然的；无意识的
自发地；自然地；不由自主地

trans.tran_cn: 自发性，自然发生，自发行为[行动]
